channel.title: Zybez API Client
channel.description:
I made this when I was bored over the past 12 or so hours. It's an application that uses the Zybez price guide api and sorts the data into two tables.
Download: http://www.mediafire.com/download/riv9jij80n9nl1g/07_Exchange.jar
Source (without libraries): http://www.mediafire.com/download/7o5vcpw2gh67g0p/org.rar
I'll be working on restoring images in the left-side table but for the time being they've been removed. They caused a horrendous amount of lag when inserted and rendered in a JTable, I'll try to fix that though.
Let me know if you find any bugs or have any suggestions/criticisms.

item.title: Zybez API Client
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“Death Style, post:4, topic:544192”]I’m not familiar with 07. I’m guessing offers are posted on Zybez and they calculate the street price that way?

Sounds neat.[/quote]
Yeah, it’s basically a third-party trading hub for 07. It’s a lot like the grand exchange without auto-completing offers, it’s very convenient

Read full topic

item.title: Zybez API Client
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

Death Style:

Any reason why you wouldn’t use the official GE api?

This is for old school RS, sorry I didn’t make that clear
Now that I think about it I could make this for rs3 also, but meh.
I made this rather than just using the zybez website because I think their website has a horrible layout and is not very cohesive

Read full topic
